pages.title: Tool recycling
pages.text: Tools can be disassembled in $(l)Blacksmith/$ tables.$(br)$(li)Hardest tool part picked for output$(br)$(li)Chisel head should be harder$(br)$(li)Output amount based on material cost$(br)$(li)Also based on table level
